'''1.5.25'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004593551|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.5|date=June 5, 2018}}</ref> is an update for the {{el|ds}} released on June 5–6, 2018, which added [[coarse dirt]], [[glass|stained glass]], and a store for DLC packs.

=== General ===
* Added the [[Super Mario]] [[mash-up pack]].
* Cartoon and Fantasy [[texture pack]]s are available for purchase.
* [[Campfire Tales]], [[City Folk]], and [[Town Folk]] [[skin pack]]s are available for purchase.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Improved stability and performance.
